    T - the type of the result of the request.

    Comparable<SpiceRequest<T>>

    public class CachedSpiceRequestStub<T>
extends CachedSpiceRequest<T>
    A CachedSpiceRequest that is state-testable. Wraps a SpiceRequestStub.

    sni
